title: New: AZEKEL â€“ Mad About The Boy
content:
East London has always been a bit of a breeding ground for new music, particularly that of the dark and sensuous R&B variety.

Mad About The Boy, the latest track from Londoner AZEKEL is drenched in an unmistakable UK aesthetic, oozing the hazy and rich sound so well associated with the city. Recorded in his flat, the track has a distinct and personal feel that exudes a creative confidence that is pretty damn hard to ignore.

Mad About The Boy is taken from the first of his 2-part collection Raw, Vol.1 due out on the 12th of July.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
